code: var contentful=require("contentful");var client=contentful.createClient({space:"dlipnuauv0sj",accessToken:"wE7IZ7NvcSRJkr8slwMR5ZM6zEByjDgC7y1nEn36gx4"});export var getAbout=function getAbout(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:"REQUEST_ABOUT_PENDING"});client.getEntries({content_type:"about"}).then(function(resp){return dispatch({type:"REQUEST_ABOUT_SUCCESS",payload:resp.items[0].fields.about});}).catch(function(error){return dispatch({type:"REQUEST_ABOUT_FAILED",payload:error});});};};export var getBlog=function getBlog(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:"REQUEST_BLOG_PENDING"});fetch("https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/9085604028025620950/posts?key=AIzaSyChWrKyLjsVyYj42CKBstkjrOnKWwPLqDs&fetchImages=true&maxResults=500").then(function(resp){return resp.json();}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:"REQUEST_BLOG_SUCCESS",payload:data.items});}).catch(function(error){return dispatch({type:"REQUEST_BLOG_FAILED",payload:error});});};};export var getImages=function getImages(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:"REQUUEST_IMAGES_PENDING"});fetch("https://api.tumblr.com/v2/blog/t:ludyybtv8EyHxeJzIanq3w/info?api_key=1K5kBBtN3I6XMgfAB6qU4kQieFrKuz2abpFw21YxeauKQcUW2s").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return Math.ceil(data.response.blog.posts/50);}).then(function(number){for(var i=0;i<number;i++){fetch("https://api.tumblr.com/v2/blog/t:ludyybtv8EyHxeJzIanq3w/posts?api_key=1K5kBBtN3I6XMgfAB6qU4kQieFrKuz2abpFw21YxeauKQcUW2s&limit=50&offset=".concat(i*50)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:"REQUEST_IMAGES_SUCCESS",payload:data.response.posts});});}}).catch(function(error){return dispatch({type:"REQUEST_IMAGES_FAILED",payload:error});});};};export var timeChange=function timeChange(time){return{type:"TIME",payload:time};};export var navToggle=function navToggle(position){return{type:"POSITION",payload:position};};export var searchToggle=function searchToggle(visible){return{type:"VISIBLE",payload:visible};};export var searching=function searching(search){return{type:"SEARCHING",payload:search};};
